Integrated Science.1: Demonstrate a broad range of knowledge and understanding of defining concepts from two or more concentration areas.
Integrated Science.2: Apply interdisciplinary approaches to critically analyze key issues related to food, energy and water.
Integrated Science.3: Communicate through writings and oral presentations, complex ideas and develop sound arguments based on technical knowledge.
Integrated Science.4: Integrate the different areas of study in their interdisciplinary degree program to examine questions, problems, or issues raised in their interdisciplinary field through a senior capstone project.
